item.title: 密歇根州一名检察官告诉陪审员，2021 年牛津高中四名学生的死亡本可以避免。詹姆斯-克伦比（James Crumbley）的儿子伊桑（Ethan）开枪打死了四名同学，他被控未能在家中安全存放枪支和弹药。
item.description:
A Michigan prosecutor told jurors that the deaths of four students at Oxford High School in 2021 could have been prevented. James Crumbley, whose son Ethan shot and killed four classmates, is accused of failing to safely store a gun and ammunition at home. pic.twitter.com/0KPgaRYGfk

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 领导德克萨斯州乌瓦尔德市对当地警官进行调查的调查员说，警方在 2022 年应对一名枪手杀害该小学 19 名学生和两名教师时 "有许多失误"。
item.description:
The investigator who led the Texas city of Uvalde's probe of its local officers said the police made “many failures” when responding to a gunman who killed 19 students and two teachers at the elementary school in 2022. https://t.co/FJSjIzIlsL

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 阿拉巴马州的立法者们在周三迅速通过了一项法案，以保护试管婴儿诊所免受未来诉讼的影响。然而，一些民主党人认为，这项快速立法在保护生殖权利方面做得还不够。
item.description:
Alabama lawmakers moved quickly to pass a bill on Wednesday to shield IVF clinics from future lawsuits.

However, some Democrats felt the fast-tracked legislation does not go far enough to protect reproductive rights. pic.twitter.com/Y6MsnFMRav

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 7, 2024
